property_title: Ultra Luxury Villa Infinity with Wellness & Panoramic View in Alanya
property_description:
When people talk aboutluxury real estate in Alanya, they usually mention square meters and amenities. But how do you put a price on the moment your shoulders drop and your breathing slows just because you stepped onto your terrace? That's the kind of luxury that doesn't show up in property listings – the luxury of coming home to peace- a kind of luxury that also qualifies you forTurkish citizenship.

Picture this: You wake up, pad barefoot to your kitchen, and while your coffee brews, you're looking out at the ancient Alanya Castle sitting proudly on its cliff, the endless blue sea stretching to the horizon, mountains rising like sleeping giants in the distance. This isn't a vacation moment you'll treasure forever – this is just Tuesday morning at your new sea view property in Alanya.

But let's flip the script for a moment. Forget the morning coffee – let's talk about coming home after a long day. You pull into your private parking, take the elevator up to your sea view home in Alanya, and suddenly the stress of the day just melts away. Why?Because you're watching one of the most spectacular light shows on earth unfold right in front of you.

As the sun sets, Alanya Castle transforms from ancient stone to a glowing beacon, its lights reflecting off the water like scattered diamonds. You can see the little houses clustered around the castle hill starting to twinkle to life – windows lighting up one by one as families settle in for the evening, the warm glow of homes creating a constellation against the darkening hillside. And above it all, the moon begins its slow climb across the sky, casting silver paths across the water that seem to lead straight to your balcony.

This isn't just a view you admire – it's therapy you live with every single evening.

Standing proud on 600m² of carefully planned land, this 525m² architectural masterpiece rises through four thoughtfully designed floors. But calling it a house feels almost insulting to what it truly represents. This is your private resort, your wellness sanctuary, your entertainment hub, and your peaceful retreat all wrapped into one extraordinary address.

The moment you step inside, the distinction between indoor and outdoor living dissolves completely. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls don't just frame views – they invite the Mediterranean landscape to become part of your daily life. Dark and light grey stone cladding gives the exterior a sophisticated strength that commands respect, while the interior's palette of whites, creams, and soft greys creates an atmosphere that breathes tranquility into every corner.

Villa Infinity brings you sea view in Alanya along with the benefit of Turkish citizenship eligibility

Here’s where Villa Infinity transforms from a beautiful home into a life-changing investment. This property is fully eligible for theTurkish Citizenship by Investment program, giving you and your family the right to secure a new future in Turkey with all the privileges that come with it.

And Turkish citizenship means more than just holding a new passport. It offers security in a stable country, access to quality healthcare and education, and the chance to establish your life in a vibrant Mediterranean city. For investors, it creates a foundation for long-term returns, while for families it guarantees a safe and welcoming environment to call home. Villa Infinity is therefore not only a residence, but a direct path to a stronger and more certain future.

Architectural Character & Exterior

This striking villa makes a bold first impression with its sophisticated blend of dark and light grey stone cladding that creates a powerful, contemporary presence. The extensive use of floor-to-ceiling glass panels and sleek glass railings doesn't just bring a modern edge – it frames the surrounding landscape like a living artwork, making the views an integral part of the home's design story.

The architectural language speaks of understated luxury, where every material choice has been carefully considered to create a sense of permanence and elegance that will age gracefully over time.

Interior Palette & Atmosphere

Step inside, and you're immediately embraced by a carefully curated color story that feels both fresh and timeless. The interior palette revolves around crisp whites, warm creams, soft beiges, and sophisticated greys – a combination that breathes serenity into every corner while maintaining an air of refined elegance. This isn't just decoration; it's the foundation of a lifestyle that values calm sophistication over fleeting trends.

The overall effect is one of spacious tranquility, where natural light dances across neutral surfaces, creating an ever-changing canvas of subtle shadows and highlights throughout the day.

Living & Social Spaces

The heart of the home showcases stunning white marble-effect flooring with clean, linear patterns that immediately evoke the luxury of a five-star hotel. But this isn't cold or intimidating – quite the opposite. The flooring serves as a beautiful backdrop for carefully selected furniture pieces that prioritize both comfort and contemporary style.

The seating areas feature plush, rounded-edge sofas and chairs with soft textures that invite you to sink in and stay awhile. These aren't just beautiful pieces – they're designed for real living, real conversations, real moments with family and friends.

Above, dramatic spherical pendant lights and strategically placed LED recessed lighting create layers of illumination that can shift the mood from bright and energizing during the day to intimate and cozy in the evening. Mahmutlar – A District Where Everyday Life Meets Holiday Spirit

Mahmutlar lies along the Alanya coastline, nestled between the Mediterranean Sea and the Taurus Mountains. It is one of Alanya’s most developed and expat-friendly districts, with a large international community that gives it a cosmopolitan yet relaxed atmosphere.

The district stretches for several kilometers, meaning you can find both lively areas with cafés, shops, and restaurants, as well as quieter zones closer to the mountains. Only 10 km from Alanya city center, Mahmutlar allows residents to enjoy peaceful daily life while remaining close to the vibrant social and commercial heart of Alanya.

Lifestyle Advantages in Mahmutlar

  • Beaches and Water Sports:Mahmutlar’s coastline offers sandy beaches perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports. Fishing is also popular along the piers and rocky spots.

  • Nature and Mountains:The Taurus foothills behind Mahmutlar invite residents to hike, picnic, or simply breathe in fresh mountain air.

  • Fitness and Wellness:The area offers gyms, hamams, yoga studios, and cycling routes, making it easy to lead a healthy lifestyle.

  • Shopping and Daily Conveniences:While YektaMall and Akdeniz Park shopping centers provide modern retail options, traditional butchers, bakeries, and hardware stores are scattered throughout the town. The Tuesday market (Salı Pazarı) is a highlight for fresh produce and local goods.

  • Transport:Local minibuses and buses connect Mahmutlar with Alanya and Kargıcak every 10 minutes, while taxis are easily available throughout the district.

Consequently, Mahmutlar is a district that truly balances everyday practicality with holiday vibes. It’s no wonder that families, retirees, digital nomads, and investors are increasingly choosing this area for long-term living or vacation homes.

property_title: Citizenship Eligible Luxury Apartment in Riviera Imperial Deluxe
property_description:
What if your everyday home felt like living in a luxury resort?

In Kargıcak, where the Mediterranean meets rolling green hills and daily life follows a calm rhythm, you’ll findRiviera Imperial Deluxe— a residential complex that reimagines what it means to live in comfort. Recognized as one of Alanya’s most complete developments, it blends the privileges of a five-star hotel with the privacy of your own home. This is not just anotherluxury apartment for sale in Alanya; it’s a lifestyle designed to indulge you in every detail. Moreover, with eligibility forTurkish citizenship by investment, it offers not only a dream home but also a strategic opportunity for your future.

 

For most people, resort facilities are reserved for a one-week holiday. At Riviera Imperial Deluxe, they become part of everyday living: spa treatments, a private cinema, sports courts, indoor and outdoor pools, fine dining, and concierge-style services — all available within your own complex. Step inside the apartment itself and you’ll notice rare touches, such as a private jacuzzi in the master bathroom, which lift this home far above the ordinary. And with the added advantage of securingTurkish citizenship, this property combines lifestyle luxury with long-term investment value.

Inside the Apartment – Luxury with Personality

With a total area of152 m², this four-room apartment balances spaciousness with elegance. Its plan includes a large living area, three bedrooms, and carefully designed bathrooms — one of which has been redeveloped to include a jacuzzi not found in other units of the complex.

Design Language

  • Modern-Luxury: Golden ceiling panels and bespoke LED lighting fixtures create a sleek, contemporary aesthetic.

  • Minimalist yet Opulent: Walls are finished in light, neutral shades, while selective use of textured stone and decorative ceilings add richness.

  • Functional Comfort: Floor heating throughout the apartment ensures warmth in all seasons, while wide glass façades flood the rooms with natural light.

The result is an interior that feels at once calm and glamorous — a home that is just as suitable for daily family life as it is for entertaining guests.

A Complex That Leaves Nothing Out

Calling Riviera Imperial Deluxe a residential project feels almost modest. It is closer to a private holiday village, where every possible amenity is provided.

  • Wellness & Spa: Turkish bath, sauna, steam room, salt room, massage facilities, and indoor pool.

  • Sports & Leisure: Football and basketball courts, tennis, mini-football, fitness center, table tennis, billiards, and cycling areas.

  • Family-Oriented Facilities: Children’s pools, playgrounds, kids’ rooms, and waterslides that make every day feel like a holiday for younger residents.

  • Social Life: A cinema, restaurant, café, lobby, meeting rooms, and pavilions bring residents together.

  • Hotel Services: 24/7 reception, cleaning services, guest rooms for visitors, and security systems that ensure peace of mind.

  • Practical Comfort: Generators, panoramic elevators, parking options, and high-speed internet zones.

With such a range of amenities, it is no exaggeration to say: living here feels like living in a self-contained luxury resort.

Why Kargıcak Makes a Difference

The apartment gains even more appeal thanks to its setting inKargıcak. This neighborhood of Alanya offers a slower rhythm than the city center, with clean beaches, open landscapes, and easy access to both Mahmutlar and Alanya.

  • Residents enjoy quiet surroundings without being isolated.

  • Public transport links (bus lines 1, 2, and 3) connect Kargıcak to the city in about twenty minutes.

  • Restaurants range from traditional Turkish family kitchens to seafront fish eateries and European-inspired venues near the hotels.

  • Outdoor activities like cycling, horse riding, and diving are close at hand, while Dimçayı and Dim Cave are easy day trips.

Kargıcak appeals especially to those who want to blend everyday convenience with a lifestyle tied to nature and the sea.

Who Will Find This Apartment Ideal?

Investors

Riviera Imperial Deluxe offers some of the strongest rental potential in Alanya. Its scale, amenities, and services attract both long-term residents and holiday renters, ensuring reliable returns.

Citizenship Seekers

With its size and price segment, this apartment qualifies for theTurkish Citizenship by Investmentprogram — a key advantage for international buyers seeking both a lifestyle upgrade and a second passport.

Families

Four spacious rooms, children’s play zones, pools, and sports fields make this apartment perfect for family living. Parents gain peace of mind from on-site services, while children enjoy resort-style freedom.

Comfort-Oriented Buyers

For those who measure quality of life not only in square meters but in services and experiences, this property delivers. From the private jacuzzi to the on-site cinema and spa, the everyday becomes extraordinary.

An Investment That Blends Prestige and Practicality

Unlike many apartments in Alanya, this home offers both tangible financial value and intangible prestige. The rare combination ofluxury hotel services and private ownershipensures that demand will remain strong, both for renting and resale. Moreover, its unique features — such as the custom jacuzzi — add individuality, making it stand out even within its own complex.

A Partner You Can Trust

Buying a property of this caliber requires guidance and reliability. At Luxury Estate Turkey, we make the process straightforward, transparent, and secure.

  • In-Depth Market Knowledge: We explain every neighborhood with clarity.

  • Legal and Administrative Support: From title deeds to citizenship applications, every step is handled.

  • Tailored Property Search: We match clients with homes that truly fit their goals.

  • After-Sales Services: Rental management, resale consultancy, and property care keep your investment protected.

  • Inspection Trips: For international buyers, we arrange visits to experience properties and surroundings firsthand.

With us, you gain not only a property but a lasting partnership — one that prioritizes your comfort, safety, and profitability.

This4 room, 152 m² apartment in Riviera Imperial Deluxecombines the exclusivity of citizenship eligibility, the comfort of a luxury hotel, and the security of a well-managed residential complex. It is more than a home; it is a lifestyle statement.
